bg.auth.authorize.invalid.body_html:
Кодът Ви за авторизация е невалиден.
Моля уверете се да копирате и поставите целия линк от полученият E-mail.
bg.auth.forgot.email_help: Въведете E-mail адреса си, за да можем да Ви изпратим информацията за влизане.
bg.auth.forgot.heading: Забравен псевдоним/парола.
bg.auth.forgot.invalid_email_error_html: Хмм, този E-mail адрес не е в нашата система. Може би не сте регистрирани?
bg.auth.forgot.sent.body_html: Изпратихме Логин Информацията на Имейла който ваведохте
bg.auth.join.almost.body_html:
Преди да влезете в Game Jolt, ще трябва да потвърдите имейла на вашия акаунт.

Ние изпратихме имейл с инструкции за потвърждаване на акаунт.
bg.You found a secret! But upon further ins: You found a secret! But on further inspection, you realize it's just an empty page.
bg.Check your Internet connection and try a: Check your Internet connection and try again.
bg.Could not set the platform for some reas: Could not set the platform for some reason.
bg.This allows you to disable right mouse c: This allows you to disable right mouse click behavior. Only enable this if your game needs to intercept right clicks.
Научи повече относно хранилището за данни
Your game details have been saved.
bg.This helps us create better filtering op: This helps us create better filtering options around which tools people use.
bg.References to or images of alcoholic bev: References to or images of alcoholic beverages.
bg.Depictions of bloodshed and the mutilati: Depictions of bloodshed and the mutilation of body parts.
bg.Depictions of cartoon-like characters in: Depictions of cartoon-like characters in unsafe situations.
Depictions of cartoon-like characters in aggressive conflict.
bg.Graphic depictions of violence involving: Graphic depictions of violence involving cartoon-like characters.
bg.References to or images of illicit drugs: References to or images of illicit drugs.
bg.Depictions of characters in unsafe situa: Depictions of characters in unsafe situations easily distinguishable from real life.
bg.Depictions of characters in aggressive c: Depictions of characters in aggressive conflict easily distinguishable from real life.
bg.Graphic depictions of violence involving: Graphic depictions of violence involving situations easily distinguishable from real life.
Players can gamble using real money.
bg.Depictions of or dialog including slapst: Depictions of or dialog including slapstick humor.
bg.Depictions of or dialog including vulgar: Depictions of or dialog including vulgar humor; bathroom humor.
bg.Depictions of or dialog including mature: Depictions of or dialog including mature humor; sexual humor.
Mild or infrequent use of profanity.
Strong or frequent use of profanity.
bg.Brief depictions of nudity or artistic n: Brief depictions of nudity or artistic nudity.
bg.Mild depictions of realistic characters: Mild depictions of realistic characters in unsafe situations.
bg.Depictions of realistic characters in ag: Depictions of realistic characters in aggressive conflict.
bg.Graphic depictions of violence involving: Graphic depictions of violence involving realistic characters.
bg.Your game's maturity information has bee: Your game's maturity information has been updated.
bg.Provocative references or depictions of: Provocative references or depictions of provocative behavior.
bg.Sexual references or depictions of sexua: Sexual references or depictions of sexual behavior.
bg.Depictions of or graphic references to r: Depictions of or graphic references to rape or other violent sexual behavior.
bg.References to or images of tobacco produ: References to or images of tobacco products.

bg.Title: Title

Manage news updates for your game.
bg.You've published your game to the site!: You've published your game to the site! Huzzah! Remember to spread the word...
bg.This release is published and can be acc: This release is published and can be accessed from your game page.
bg.Are you sure you want to remove this bui: Are you sure you want to remove this build?
bg.The build has been removed from the rele: The build has been removed from the release.
bg.Learn more about choosing a good version: Learn more about choosing a good version number...
bg.Are you sure you want to publish this re: Are you sure you want to publish this release? All of its builds will become active on your game page.
bg.The release is now active on your game p: The release is now active on your game page.
bg.Are you sure you want to remove this rel: Are you sure you want to remove this release? All of its builds will be removed as well.
bg.The release and its builds have been rem: The release and its builds have been removed from the package.
bg.Are you sure you want to hide this relea: Are you sure you want to hide this release? It will no longer be accessible from your game page.
bg.The release has been unpublished and is: The release has been unpublished and is now hidden.
bg.Are you sure you want to permanently rem: Are you sure you want to permanently remove your game?
bg.Your game has been removed from the site: Your game has been removed from the site. Maybe a phoenix will rise in its place one day.
bg.Scores with lower values are ranked bett: Scores with lower values are ranked better.
bg.Scores with higher values are ranked bet: Scores with higher values are ranked better.
bg.Name: Name
bg.Scores with lower values are ranked bett: Scores with lower values are ranked better/higher.
bg.Scores with higher values are ranked bet: Scores with higher values are ranked better/higher.

bg.What are the thumbnail requirements and: What are the thumbnail requirements and guidelines?
bg.Are you sure you want to clear this trop: Are you sure you want to clear this trophy image?
bg.Secret trophies hide everything but thei: Secret trophies hide everything but their titles from players until they are achieved.
bg.Trophies that are hidden will only appea: Trophies that are hidden will only appear on the site for you, the developer, for testing purposes.
bg.Are you sure you want to remove this tro: Are you sure you want to remove this trophy?
bg.Making a trophy secret hides everything: Making a trophy secret hides everything but its name until it is achieved.
bg.Game does not belong to this developer: Играта не принадлежи на този разработчик.
bg.There are no scores on this scoreboard y: There are no scores on this scoreboard yet.
There are no trophies for this game yet. Bug the developer about adding some!
bg.Get notifications when people post new r: Get notifications when people post new replies to this thread.
bg.Incorrect maturity rating for the conten: Incorrect maturity rating for the content in the game
bg.It is hate speech or contains graphic co: It is hate speech or contains graphic content
bg.It is pornographic or contains sexually: It is pornographic or contains sexually explicit material
bg.It is spam or unwanted commercial conten: It is spam or unwanted commercial content
bg.Follow this playlist to add it to your l: Follow this playlist to add it to your library and be notified when new games are added.
bg.Unfollow this playlist to remove it from: Unfollow this playlist to remove it from your library and stop receiving notifications.
bg.Uh-oh, something has prevented you from: Uh-oh, something has prevented you from unfollowing this game.
bg.Are you sure you want to remove this gam: Are you sure you want to remove this game from the playlist?
bg.No information on game page (no screensh: No information on game page (no screenshots, sparse description, placeholder page, etc.)
bg.Oh no! We couldn't download this package: Oh no! We couldn't download this package. Perhaps check that you're still online?
bg.Oh no! We couldn't unpack this package a: Oh no! We couldn't unpack this package after downloading it. Maybe try again?
bg.Profile or username contains explicit or: Profile or username contains explicit or sensitive material
The sender will not be notified.

bg.This is the directory on your computer t: Това е директорията на компютъра, където ще бъдат инсталирани игрите.
bg.An extraction is when the game is unpack: An extraction is when the game is unpacked and installed after downloading.
bg.If you have more than this number, downl: If you have more than this number, downloads will be queued up.
bg.If you have more than this number, extra: If you have more than this number, extractions will be queued up.

Your system report has been sent.
bg.Thanks for helping us make Game Jolt a p: Благодарим ви, че помагате да направим Game Jolt място за всеки. Ще погледнем възможно най-скоро.
bg.There's been an error, and it's of the d: There's been an error, and it's of the dubious sort.

bg.This build is not launchable on certain: This build is not launchable on certain platforms. They've been disabled below.
bg.This package can not be installed on you: This package can not be installed on your system, but can be quick played in the client.
This package can not be installed on your system.
